value.title: Zerg versus Protoss Early Game - StarCraft II Study
value.excerpt: So you want to win versus Protoss? Today we discuss the Zerg versus Protoss matchup in it's very basics. You need to be hitting between 40 and 44 supply at the 5:50 mark. Why?
